variants.Description in input context: This variant causes a structural change in the protein, affecting its function.

Material used.Material Name: HEK293 or Neuron-specific cells (based on context)
Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using a combination of HEK293 and neuron-specific cells to study the effects of the variant.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was affected by the variant, showing an intermediate effect.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA or wild-type protein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector or no cDNA/protein was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: 't-test' or 'ANOVA' was used for statistical analysis, based on the context.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.
